field

public static java.lang.String field(java.lang.String str,
                                     java.lang.String sep,
                                     int beg,
                                     int amt)
same as pick fld()

Parameters:
str - String to parse
sep - seperator wihin str
beg - field to find, where first field is 1
amt - number of fields to return, -1 for all after the beg
